item.title: Lisa add a quote by Bernhard Schlink
item.description: "There's no need to talk about it, because the truth of what one says lies in what one does." -- Bernhard Schlink

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Jeanette Winterson
item.description: "the buddhists say there are 149 ways to god. i'm not looking for god, only for myself, and that is far more complicated." -- Jeanette Winterson

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Wally Lamb
item.description: "I know it's a crock of shit. I ain't offering you happily-ever-after. I'm offering you... happily-maybe-sometimes-ever-after. Sort of. You know, with warts and shit." -Thayer" -- Wally Lamb

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "In the end, though, maybe we must all give up trying to pay back the people in this world who sustain our lives. In the end, maybe it's wiser to surrender before the miraculous scope of human generosity and to just keep saying thank you, forever and sincerely, for as long as we have voices." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Elizabeth Gilbert
item.description: "People tend to think that happiness is a stroke of luck, something that will descend like fine weather if you're fortunate. But happiness is the result of personal effort. You fight for it, strive for it, insist upon it, and sometimes even travel around the world looking for it. You have to participate relentlessly." -- Elizabeth Gilbert

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Janet Fitch
item.description: "Remember it all, every insult, every tear. Tattoo it on the inside of your mind. In life, knowledge of poisons is essential. I've told you, nobody becomes an artist unless they have to." -- Janet Fitch

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Janet Fitch
item.description: "How right that the body changed over time, becoming a gallery of scars, a canvas of experience, a testament to life and one's capacity to endure it." -- Janet Fitch

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Marthe Troly-Curtin
item.description: "Time you enjoy wasting is not wasted time." -- Marthe Troly-Curtin

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Listen to the mustn'ts, child. Listen to the don'ts. Listen to the shouldn'ts, the impossibles, the won'ts. Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me... Anything can happen, child. Anything can be." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Lisa add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "You're going to come across people in your life who will say all the right words at all the right times. But in the end, it's always their actions you should judge them by. It's actions, not words, that matter." -- Nicholas Sparks
